column4: Anyone know about installing aMsn..Ive ran the config and everything just cant run the make or make install command
Im getting this error everytime I try to run the 'make install' command :root@chris-desktop:/home/chris/amsn-0.96# make install
make: *** No rule to make target `install'.  Stop.
Getting this error everytime i try to run 'make install':root@chris-desktop:/home/chris/amsn-0.96# make install
make: *** No rule to make target `install'.  Stop. anyone help?
you need to see the ./Makefile and see the install target
for the make to work, it has to have the specified target in the Makefile
how i make a specified target/
I can not teach you how to create the Makefile here..you need to google for a tutorial on Makefile and configure, and autotools
it already has a Makefile mate, just cant get it to execute right
you can find an existing Makefile on the current system and take a look inside it
edit the Makefile and look for  'install' in the first column
the program i want to install already has a makefile in the folder but i just cant seem to execute it correctly to make the program install
you can use vim to edit a Makefile, and look inside it for the "install" target
that dont looked right,  each target should only have one  ":"
